sentence.Network_en: Diplomatic efforts to reach a settlement resume today after a two-week hiatus.
sentence.Network_cn: 为寻求解决方案而进行的外交谈判在中断了两周之后于今天重新开始。

sentence.Network_en: The company expects to resume production of the vehicle again after a two - month hiatus.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司希望在两个月的中断之后能重新开始车辆的生产.

sentence.Network_en: There was a hiatus in his acting life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的演艺生涯曾一度中断。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...tratigraphic break）是指在一套沉积岩的层序中的一个限定层位突然出现岩性的明显变化。这一现象常指示假整合或沉积间断（hiatus）的存在，即所谓地层间断。[1]
石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... hiatus concretion 沉积间断结核 hiatus 间断 Hibernian orogeny 希伯尼造山运动.
hermit 隐士hiatus 空隙hibernate 冬眠
herpes 疱疹hiatus 裂孔hydrophobia 狂犬病

list.abs: nondeposition 非沉积作用nondepositional hiatus 无沉积间断nondestructive examination 无损探伤
stratigraphical gap 地层间断stratigraphical hiatus 地层间断stratigraphy 地层学
stratigraphic guide 地层标志stratigraphic hiatus 缺层stratigraphic high resolution dipmeter tool 地层学高分辨.
食管裂孔疝(hiatus hernia)是指腹腔内脏器(主要是胃)通过膈食管裂孔进入胸腔所致的疾病。食管裂孔疝是膈疝中最常见者，达90%以上。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally denoting a physical gap or opening): from Latin, literally gaping', from hiare 'gape'

entry.def: A hiatus is a pause in which nothing happens, or a gap where something is missing.

example.ex: Diplomatic efforts to reach a settlement resume today after a two-week hiatus...
example.tran: 为寻求解决方案而进行的外交谈判在中断了两周之后于今天重新开始。

example.ex: There was a hiatus in his acting life.
example.tran: 他的演艺生涯曾一度中断。

means.word_mean: 1. an interruption in the intensity or amount of something
2. a missing piece (as a gap in a manuscript)
3. a natural opening or perforation through a bone or a membranous structure

auth_sentence.content: Or on hiatus, in some deep ruminative lag.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or on hiatus, in some deep ruminative lag.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or on hiatus, in some deep ruminative lag.

auth_sentence.content: Her mother had a hiatus hernia and suffered breathing difficulties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her mother had a hiatus hernia and suffered breathing difficulties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her mother had a hiatus hernia and suffered breathing difficulties.

auth_sentence.content: Lunch was a hiatus which separated the morning from the afternoon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lunch was a hiatus which separated the morning from the afternoon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lunch was a hiatus which separated the morning from the afternoon.

means.word_mean: （连续中的）裂隙;缺漏;脱漏;间断

sentences.en: The company expects to resume production of the vehicle again after a two-month hiatus.
sentences.cn: 公司希望在两个月的中断之后能重新开始车辆的生产。
